content:
[Ohio Senate 2024 | Columbus Metro (Franklin County - Upper Arlington/Dublin) | P9: F, 29, Consultant, Short North, Biden 2020, young professional]
Q: What about Jim Stanton?
"He's running ads about crime and immigration in Columbus. We don't have those problems."

content_original: He's running ads about crime and immigration in Columbus. We don't have those problems.
